gen:link.msg:message: The reported value of `RevaluationReserve` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `RevaluationReserveMovement`, because `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PrecondRevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PrecondRevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ERevaluationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ERevaluationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SAdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SAdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RevaluationReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RevaluationReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value of `RevaluationReserve` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `RevaluationReserve` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `RevaluationReserveMovement`, because `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies` is not reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ERevaluationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ERevaluationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SRevaluationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SRevaluationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RevaluationReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RevaluationReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies` SHOULD be equal to + `RevaluationReserve` + `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies` - `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPoliciesTaxImpact`, because `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_PrecondRevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_PrecondRevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_RevaluationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_RevaluationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPoliciesTaxImpact')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPoliciesTaxImpact return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustedRevaluationReserveAfterRecalculationChangeAccountingPolicies` SHOULD exist at least once within the same context, because `RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtExistenceThnExistence1E1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtExistenceThnExistence1E1_RevaluationReserveChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RecognisedDirectlyThroughEquityMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RecognisedDirectlyThroughEquityMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RevaluationReserveMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RevaluationReserveMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RevaluationReserveMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_RevaluationReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_RevaluationReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfRevaluationReserveMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RevaluationReserve` reported with `ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis` and `RevaluationReserveMember` SHOULD be equal to `RevaluationReserve` without `ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis` and RevaluationReserveMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRevaluationReserveStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfRevaluationReserveAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
